summary: Created comprehensive Metalogic_v2 test suite with 4 new test files (FMPTest, ContextProvabilityTest, TruthLemmaPropertyTest, CanonicalModelPropertyTest), fixed sorry in CorePropertyTest, and removed broken FMP import from RepresentationTest. All tests build successfully except CompletenessTest which is blocked by pre-existing FiniteModelProperty.lean source errors.

artifacts.summary: Tests FMP-related infrastructure including complexity, consistency definitions, and canonical model
Tests context provability bridge lemmas and validity/derivability equivalences
Tests truth lemma variants for all formula constructors and MCS properties
Tests canonical model construction, SemanticWorldState, and main_provable_iff_valid_v2
Implementation summary with verification results and known limitations

next_steps: Review implementation summary and create separate task to fix FiniteModelProperty.lean source errors
